content.question: <math alttext="the integral from, 3 to 5, of, the fraction with numerator 2 times x squared, plus x, plus 4, and denominator x minus 1, end fraction, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo stretchy="true">∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle><mtext> </mtext><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction 139 over 9, end fraction, minus 23" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>139</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mn>23</mn></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the complex fraction with numerator the fraction 695 over 6, end fraction, minus, the fraction 69 over 2, and denominator the fraction 15 over 2, end fraction, minus, three halves, end complex fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>695</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>69</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>15</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="22 plus, 7 times, open parenthesis, the natural log of 4, minus, the natural log of 2, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>22</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="24 plus, 8 times, open parenthesis, the natural log of 4, minus, the natural log of 2, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>24</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
